attributes.action: End MP second home & meal allowance via government owned and serviced high rise.
attributes.background: MP’s can claim personal expenses for second homes and meals, when working in London. End this practice which wrongly creates personal wealth for MP’s by providing accommodation, meals and security in a single government owned, serviced accommodation building i.e. a refurbished Grenfell.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
